Disclaimer:
I have probably 1000+ hrs in this game and stopped playing when blizzard betrayed us. (thx to blizzards higher- ups)

First of all, to understand why this game sucks now, you need to know a few things.
The original game was released 2016 and it was revolutionary and well monetized. The only thing you had to buy was the game. To get cosmetics there were lootboxes, doesn't sound good at first glance but they were the fairest lootboxes that existed. You basically got one every few rounds, so there was really no need to ever buy one. Besides if you already had one of the 4 items per chest you got coins to buy yourself what you want. The only things you could buy where lootboxes which, as I said you get by playing and ow league tokens for esports skins, you can also earn them for free by watching esports via twitch. So you get new content, events, skins and champions all for free if you play a bit (which isnt even much compared to other games).

Then around 2019 the game stopped getting any support or relevant updates, besides small balance changes and a few skins. The game slowly died, the reason for that is and i quote Blizzard: "to put more resources in Overwatch 2". 
A few years and many delays later we got overwatch 2. You might think after they left overwatch 1 to die, they had enough time and resources to at least vaguely release what they had planned. 

-3 new champions and a few maps...
-one new mode
-no PVE...
-no revolutionary new stuff...
-5v5
-better graphics


They just slightly expanded the current roster. The biggest changes where the better graphics and 5v5.
Matter of fact they even removed a lot of features:

-No more lootboxes, now a battlepass and overpriced shop items.
-Your account level is now freezed forever.
-The medal system and the end-card system at the end of the round.
-Even being on fire was not possible anymore.
-and so on...

And now comes the really bad part:

The promised PVE wasnt there on release, the big thing that should have made overwatch to overwatch 2, it just wasnt there. And so blizzard said it comes soon as promised (few month after the release). It didnt. They started to delay things again and again. Until season 6. And the thing is you didnt get the promised "full story campaign" with the hero mode and "endlessly replayable pve" with "customizable abilities" and leveling up your champion and so on. 

So what exactly did we get you ask?
The first chapter of the story for 15â‚¬ or whatever. The worst thing about it is that they knew that even before ow2 was released and they still kept it secret, because the whole community was waiting for pve. So they lied to us, for their profit. That people can buy the battlepasses and cosmetics to later us in the "promised pve". Sure some people didnt care about pve, good for them. But the fact that they promised something amazing that would have been worth the wait and then lying intentionally about it, for the new overprized monetization model. I think they breaked the news in season 4. This game is just a cashgrab and not the fun it used to be. Granted you still can have fun if you are new to the game, but the 14% positiv steam reviews at the time speaks for itself.

Just dont support people that treat thei community like trash.
